{{ title }}

Tara Dowdell Group | Jersey City, NJ

Pubic Relations Manager (June 2018 – Present)

Manage a public relations staff of two with a full-service PR, design, and marketing firm.

  • Coordinate the development and execution of client deliverables in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
  • Provide clients with media consultation and press materials to media for major client initiatives and events, and developing media campaigns for clients in support of business or organizational objectives.
  • Secured placement in local, state, and national media, including The New York Times and Financial Times.
  • Experienced at conducting media training seminars for non-profit executives, and elected and appointed government officials.

The Citizens Campaign | Metuchen, NJ

Communications Coordinator (Nov. 2015 – June 2018)

Oversaw community and stakeholder outreach as well as securing press.

  • Managed all aspects of communications and marketing strategies — press conferences, media releases, media outreach, social media — for a $2 million statewide civic awareness campaign called “The Civic Challenge.”
  • Cultivated and maintained relationships with community leaders and journalists.
  • Managed public relations including organizing a nonpartisan televised gubernatorial debate.

NJ Tech Weekly | Remote

Reporter (Oct. 2013 – Nov. 2015)

Contributing writer for New Jersey’s onlxy technology-focused publication.

  • Covered technology and business-related news and events around the state.
  • Wrote 2 of the Top 10 Most Popular Pieces list for NJ Tech Weekly in 2014 and 2015.

The Progress | Caldwell, NJ

Reporter (Nov. 2008 – Aug. 2012)

Reporter covering 6 western Essex County, New Jersey municipalities.

  • Covered a range of areas — breaking news, government, police, business, education — as a full-time general assignment reporter and photographer for a readership of 10,000+.
  • Oversaw the launch and management of all social media accounts, attracting 2,000+ followers within the first year.
  • First place award for news writing with the New Jersey Press Association in 2011.

Education

  • Rutgers University, M.P.A.P., Edward J. Bloustein School of Planning and Public Policy – 2022
  • Rutgers University, M.A., Communication and Information Studies – 2014
  • Montclair State University, B.A., Political Science and Philosophy – 2008

Community/Professional Activities

  • New Leaders Council New Jersey, Fellow, Class of 2018
  • Communications Co-chair 2018 – 2021
  • Rutgers University Eagleton Institute of Politics Graduate Fellow Class of 2014
  • Alumni Co-Chair 2016 – 2018
  • New Jersey Office of Legislative Services, Eagleton Institute of Politics Jan. – May 2014
